thread.title: Oregon school shooting: Candlelight prayer vigil at 8 p.m. tonight at Roseburg's Stewart Park
thread.title_full: Oregon school shooting: Candlelight prayer vigil at 8 p.m. tonight at Roseburg's Stewart Park | OregonLive.com

author: Grant Butler | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Oregon school shooting: Candlelight prayer vigil at 8 p.m. tonight at Roseburg's Stewart Park
text:
A public candlelight prayer vigil is planned for 8 p.m. Thursday at Roseburg's Stewart Park in the wake of the mass shooting earlier at Umpqua Community College .
Several Roseburg area pastors confirmed that the vigil would take place in Stewart Park , a large city-owned park west of Interstate 5.
In addition to the public vigil, several Roseburg churches were open Thursday, including Wellspring Bible Fellowship , where associate youth pastor Rob Johnson said grief counseling was available.
"We're open to anyone who wants to pray or sit in silence. We also have counselors, so if they want to talk, we're here, and we plan to be here through the night into tomorrow."
Oregon school shooting: Chronology of events so far Umpqua Community College shooting - what we know so far. Updates until 1:21pm.
Newlife Christian Center was also open for grief counseling and prayer Thursday afternoon. Associate pastor Russ Wilson said the church would also have its own prayer vigil at 6:30 p.m., before joining the public vigil at Stewart Park.
Redeemer's Fellowship was open Thursday for pastoral counseling, and will offer counseling from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m. Friday.
-- Grant Butler
gbutler@oregonian.com
